mapper.select: select id, inbound_date, vendor_name, buyer_name, buyer_type, disrate, dismoney, offers_price, depot_name, vetting_name, last_vetting_time, vetting_state, associated_order, exit_order_id, payment_order, cav_id, invoice_id, create_people, contact, update_people, create_date, update_date, counter from frameproject.purchase_receipt where id = #{id}

select id, inbound_date, vendor_name, buyer_name, buyer_type, disrate, dismoney, offers_price, depot_name, vetting_name, last_vetting_time, vetting_state, associated_order, exit_order_id, payment_order, cav_id, invoice_id, create_people, contact, update_people, create_date, update_date, counter from frameproject.purchase_receipt limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into frameproject.purchase_receipt(inbound_date, vendor_name, buyer_name, buyer_type, disrate, dismoney, offers_price, depot_name, vetting_name, last_vetting_time, vetting_state, associated_order, exit_order_id, payment_order, cav_id, invoice_id, create_people, contact, update_people, create_date, update_date, counter) values (#{inboundDate}, #{vendorName}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerType}, #{disrate}, #{dismoney}, #{offersPrice}, #{depotName}, #{vettingName}, #{lastVettingTime}, #{vettingState}, #{associatedOrder}, #{exitOrderId}, #{paymentOrder}, #{cavId}, #{invoiceId}, #{createPeople}, #{contact}, #{updatePeople}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{counter})

insert into frameproject.purchase_receipt(inbound_date, vendor_name, buyer_name, buyer_type, disrate, dismoney, offers_price, depot_name, vetting_name, last_vetting_time, vetting_state, associated_order, exit_order_id, payment_order, cav_id, invoice_id, create_people, contact, update_people, create_date, update_date, counter) values
(#{entity.inboundDate}, #{entity.vendorName}, #{entity.buyerName}, #{entity.buyerType}, #{entity.disrate}, #{entity.dismoney}, #{entity.offersPrice}, #{entity.depotName}, #{entity.vettingName}, #{entity.lastVettingTime}, #{entity.vettingState}, #{entity.associatedOrder}, #{entity.exitOrderId}, #{entity.paymentOrder}, #{entity.cavId}, #{entity.invoiceId}, #{entity.createPeople}, #{entity.contact}, #{entity.updatePeople}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.counter})

insert into frameproject.purchase_receipt(inbound_date, vendor_name, buyer_name, buyer_type, disrate, dismoney, offers_price, depot_name, vetting_name, last_vetting_time, vetting_state, associated_order, exit_order_id, payment_order, cav_id, invoice_id, create_people, contact, update_people, create_date, update_date, counter) values
(#{entity.inboundDate}, #{entity.vendorName}, #{entity.buyerName}, #{entity.buyerType}, #{entity.disrate}, #{entity.dismoney}, #{entity.offersPrice}, #{entity.depotName}, #{entity.vettingName}, #{entity.lastVettingTime}, #{entity.vettingState}, #{entity.associatedOrder}, #{entity.exitOrderId}, #{entity.paymentOrder}, #{entity.cavId}, #{entity.invoiceId}, #{entity.createPeople}, #{entity.contact}, #{entity.updatePeople}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.counter})
on duplicate key update inbound_date = values(inbound_date) , vendor_name = values(vendor_name) , buyer_name = values(buyer_name) , buyer_type = values(buyer_type) , disrate = values(disrate) , dismoney = values(dismoney) , offers_price = values(offers_price) , depot_name = values(depot_name) , vetting_name = values(vetting_name) , last_vetting_time = values(last_vetting_time) , vetting_state = values(vetting_state) , associated_order = values(associated_order) , exit_order_id = values(exit_order_id) , payment_order = values(payment_order) , cav_id = values(cav_id) , invoice_id = values(invoice_id) , create_people = values(create_people) , contact = values(contact) , update_people = values(update_people) , create_date = values(create_date) , update_date = values(update_date) , counter = values(counter)
mapper.update:
update frameproject.purchase_receipt
inbound_date = #{inboundDate},
vendor_name = #{vendorName},
buyer_name = #{buyerName},
buyer_type = #{buyerType},
disrate = #{disrate},
dismoney = #{dismoney},
offers_price = #{offersPrice},
depot_name = #{depotName},
vetting_name = #{vettingName},
last_vetting_time = #{lastVettingTime},
vetting_state = #{vettingState},
associated_order = #{associatedOrder},
exit_order_id = #{exitOrderId},
payment_order = #{paymentOrder},
cav_id = #{cavId},
invoice_id = #{invoiceId},
create_people = #{createPeople},
contact = #{contact},
update_people = #{updatePeople},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
counter = #{counter},
where id = #{id}
